description: Secret deliberations weigh the risks between harsh control and public appeasement; anxiety simmers as rumors of unrest spread.
Nikola quietly flags the data strike plan for slow-walk approval, stalls the clampdown, and leaves vulnerabilities unreported, enabling the strike to gather real momentum.
Widespread 'data strike' erupts, with thousands scrambling or erasing BCI profiles—services falter and Council is forced to take notice.
